hadiths.text: Uthman said:"I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say: 'There is no man who performs Wudu' and does it well, then prays, but when he prays it, he will be forgiven whatever (sins he commits) between that and the next prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب ثَوَابِ مَنْ تَوَضَّأَ كَمَا أُمِرَ
chapter.eng-name: The Reward For The One Who Performs Wudu' As Commanded
